headline: Russia Projects Increasing Influence in Africa, Worrying the West
abstract: The Kremlin is increasing arms sales, security pacts and training programs as the American defense secretary weighs withdrawing troops from the continent.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Nearly 200 Russian mercenaries have deployed in recent months to Mozambique to combat a growing Islamic State offshoot there, even as Moscow is taking initial steps toward building a military port in the Horn of Africa that could become Russia’s first permanent base on the continent.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
